ActOther Than Statutory Authority
PrecisAppointment of the HONOURABLE R. LESTER JESUDASON, a Judge of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia, to be Associate Chief Justice of the Supreme Court of Nova Scotia (Family Division), and a Judge ex officio of the Nova Scotia Court of Appeal.
